mapper.insert: insert into article(article_id, user_id, ariticle_title, content, scan_count, likes_count, reply_count) values (#{articleId}, #{userId}, #{ariticleTitle}, #{content} #{scanCount}, #{likesCount}, #{replyCount});
mapper.update: update article set ariticle_title=#{ariticleTitle}, content=#{content}, likes_num=#{likesNum}, scan_num=#{scanNum}, reply_id=#{replyId} where article_id = #{articleId}
